Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis

Package Server.Exception

package Server.Exception
This package contains the exception classes that are thrown by the server.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Server
    This package contains the classes that are used in the server side of the application.
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    AlreadyFinishedException
    Exception thrown when a game is already finished
    AlreadySetException
    Exception thrown when asking to set a value that is already set
    AlreadyStartedException
    Exception thrown when a game is already started
    IncorrectDeckPositionException
    Exception thrown when trying to use DECK as a board position
    InvalidMoveException
    Exception thrown when a move is invalid
    MissingInfoException
    Exception thrown when a required data is missing
    NotYetStartedException
    Exception thrown when a game is not yet started
    PlayerNotFoundByNameException
    Exception thrown when trying to retrieve a player by name and the player is not found
    PlayerNotInAnyServerConnectionHandlerException
    Exception thrown when a player is not in any server connection handler (i.e. disconnected)
    TooFewElementsException
    Exception thrown when there are too few elements to do an action.
    TooManyElementsException
    Exception thrown when there are too many elements to do an action.
    TooManyPlayersException
    Exception thrown when there are too many players
